name: nodejs-streams-examples
description: Comprehensive Node.js Streams examples with real-world use cases and production patterns

scripts.all: npm run readable && npm run writable && npm run transform && npm run duplex && npm run production
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const files = fs.readdirSync(__dirname).filter(f => f.startsWith('output-') || f.startsWith('compressed') || f.startsWith('decrypted') || f.startsWith('uploaded-') || f.startsWith('app.') || f.startsWith('part') || f.startsWith('merged') || f.startsWith('sample.log') || f.startsWith('secure.')); files.forEach(f => { try { fs.unlinkSync(path.join(__dirname, f)); console.log('Deleted:', f); } catch(e) {} });"
